article_title: Woman shot dead in northwest Indiana
article_text:
Woman shot dead in northwest Indiana

A 23-year-old woman died Saturday night after being shot in northwest Indiana.

Breona Major suffered multiple gunshot wounds and was pronounced dead at 8:13 p.m. in the 2300 block of Clark Road in Gary, according to a statement from the Lake County coroner’s office.

Major lived on the block where she was shot, and her death was ruled a homicide, authorities said.

Gary police could not be reached for details early Sunday.
